name: Tiny Run
description:
*** We have a very special, limited time character - available during these holidays ONLY ***

Join Tiny and his friends in the most fun runner in the Store!
Play as Tiny or any of his quirky friends to be the ultimate winner in this race for running supremacy, using devious, sneaky powerups and low cunning to outrun your opponents!
If you think you're in for an easy win, think again, because nothing's for sure in TinyRun until you've crossed the finish line! Winning a race has never felt this satisfying!

Awesome Features:
- Compete across many different, beautifully-designed worlds
- Funny and despicable powerups to use against your opponents!
- Collect quirky characters with unique abilities!
- Easy, intuitive controls
- Safe for kids - No inappropriate violence
- Save your progress across all your devices!

PS -
We listened to all the awesome inspirational sport songs like "We are the Champions"
and "Eye of the Tiger" and made sure all our characters listened in too. So those guys are really psyched and ready to race for you!
Go go go!


Note for Parents : TinyRun contains in-app purchases that can be bought for real money.
